cosinnus_message.management.commands.fake_process_direct_reply_mails module¶

class cosinnus_message.management.commands.fake_process_direct_reply_mails.Command(stdout=None, stderr=None, no_color=False, force_color=False)¶

Bases: BaseCommand

Downloads all mail for mailboxes in this portal, then processes direct replies as answers.

cosinnus_message.management.commands.rocket_create_missing_users module¶

class cosinnus_message.management.commands.rocket_create_missing_users.Command(stdout=None, stderr=None, no_color=False, force_color=False)¶

Bases: BaseCommand

Create missing user accounts in rocketchat (and verify that ones with an existing connection still exist in rocketchat properly). Inactive user accounts and ones that never logged in will also be created. Will never create accounts for users with __unverified__ emails.

@param –skip-inactive: if given, will not create any accounts for inactive users @param –force-group-membership-sync: if given, will also re-do and sync all group

memberships, for all users. (default: only sync memberships for users created during this run)

add_arguments(parser)¶

Entry point for subclassed commands to add custom arguments.

handle(*args, **options)¶

The actual logic of the command. Subclasses must implement this method.

cosinnus_message.management.commands.rocket_sync_default_notification_settings module¶

class cosinnus_message.management.commands.rocket_sync_default_notification_settings.Command(stdout=None, stderr=None, no_color=False, force_color=False)¶

Bases: BaseCommand

For all users who have not yet set any rocketchat mail notification preference, this will set the equivalent of their current portal-mail notification setting as their rocketchat-mail notification preference. Users who have saved their preference before are left untouched.

This is not neccessary to run on new portals, as the setting is set on user creation already.

add_arguments(parser)¶

Entry point for subclassed commands to add custom arguments.

handle(*args, **options)¶

The actual logic of the command. Subclasses must implement this method.
